description: Privacy-focused browser with local AI, advanced tab management, personal search, Privacy-Focused Browser with Local AI Assistance WebLibre is an independent privacy-focused browser for Android built on Mozilla's Gecko Engine and Mozilla Android Components. It offers a fully-featured web browser with extension support, enhanced by powerful privacy features, local AI assistance (opt-in), and advanced tab organization tools. Privacy by Design WebLibre shields you from third-party surveillance—whether by ISPs, tracking companies, or other entities seeking to monitor your browsing habits: - Web Engine Hardening: Comprehensive privacy and security presets to resist tracking and fingerprinting - Cookie Isolation: Cookies separated by container or context, preventing cross-site tracking - Content Blocking: Blocks ads, trackers, and unwanted content by default - Tor Proxying: Route browsing traffic through the Tor network for enhanced anonymity - Local Search Engine: Your device handles search and retrieval, minimizing remote service contact - No Tracking or Telemetry: WebLibre does not track, monitor, or collect any browsing data Advanced Tab Management - Tab Containers: Organize tabs into isolated containers with separate cookie contexts, Tor proxy support, biometric authentication, and automatic site assignments - Tree View Navigation: Visualize and manage complex tab hierarchies with parent-child relationships - Local AI Assistance: Use on-device AI models to intelligently group related tabs into new containers - Flexible Views: Choose between list view, grid view, or tree view with tab hierarchy Personal Local Search Engine Instantly search across open tabs (with full page content), bookmarks, web feeds, browsing history, and bangs. All indexing and search operations happen on your device—your data never leaves your control. Multi-User Profiles Complete profile isolation with separate browsing data, extensions, settings, and databases per user. Each profile maintains its own containers, add-ons, privacy settings, and preferences. Download WebLibre and browse freely and privately with genuine control over your online experience.
